p: Murine oligodendrocytes (158N) [ 33] were cultured in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s Medium (DMEM) (Lonza, Amboise, France) with 5% ( v/ v) heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Dutscher, Brumath, France) and 1% antibiotics (penicillin, streptomycin) (Dutscher). The cells were inoculated at 30,000 cells/cm 2, either in petri dishes (100 × 20 mm, FALCON, Corning, NY, USA) with 10 mL of culture medium, or at 240,000 cells per well on six-well plates with 2 mL of culture medium.
